title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.9 - Positive declarations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 586.9 - Positive declarations

State Regulations
(a) If the
agency determines that a type I or unlisted action is subject to SEQR and may
have a significant effect on the environment, it shall prepare, maintain and
file a notice of determination that an EIS will be prepared ("positive
declaration") and maintain written analyses and findings supporting such
determination in accordance with 6 NYCRR sections 617.7 and 617.12 and in the
file referred to in section
586.8
(b) of this

Part. (b) In order to provide an
opportunity for public notice and response, the agency will file positive
declarations monthly in the file referred to in section
586.8
(b) of this

Part, and will incorporate reference to the positive declaration in other
notices required by law in connection with the action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
586.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
